fields.name: user_agent
fields.description: The user agent of the browser

fields.name: response_time_ms
fields.description: The time it took to load the html document. responseEnd - navigationStart. See: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Navigation_timing_API

fields.name: processing_time_ms
fields.description: The time it took to load dom content. domComplete - domLoading. See: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Navigation_timing_API

fields.name: load_time_ms
fields.description: The time it took to load the html document. loadEventEnd - loadEventStart. See: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Navigation_timing_API

fields.name: message
fields.description: The message property from the JavaScript ErrorEvent object.

fields.name: session
fields.description: The session of the user from the browser

fields.name: visitor
fields.description: A session visitor is a unique identifier for our best guess as to who the individual user is interacting with Flow.

fields.name: visit
fields.description: A session visit expires after a configurable period of inactivity (e.g. 30 minutes).

fields.name: browser
fields.description: Browser information for the user

fields.name: filename
fields.description: The filename property from the JavaScript ErrorEvent object.

fields.name: lineno
fields.description: The lineno property from the JavaScript ErrorEvent object.

fields.name: colno
fields.description: The colno property from the JavaScript ErrorEvent object.

fields.name: stack
fields.description: The error.stack property from the JavaScript ErrorEvent object.

fields.name: geo
fields.description: Geographic information for user

fields.name: created_at
fields.description: Date the event was processed. Not required because model is shared with browser and the time from the browser cannot be trusted. Server should set timestamp before further processing

fields.description: The name of the item

fields.name: created_at
fields.description: Date the event was processed. Not required because model is shared with browser and the time from the browser cannot be trusted. Server should set timestamp before further processing

fields.name: country
fields.description: The ISO 3166-3 country code. Case insensitive. See https://api.flow.io/reference/countries

fields.name: currency
fields.description: ISO 4217 3 currency code as defined in https://api.flow.io/reference/currencies

fields.name: language
fields.description: ISO 639 2 language code as defined in https://api.flow.io/reference/languages

fields.name: locale
fields.description: Locale Id as defined in https://api.flow.io/reference/locales

fields.name: experience
fields.description: The ID of a specific experience to use

fields.name: host
fields.description: The host of the url from window.location.host in the browser

fields.name: pathname
fields.description: The pathname of the the url from window.location.pathname in the browser

fields.name: search
fields.description: The search section fo the url from window.location.search

fields.name: location
fields.description: Location data as it comes from the window.location object in the browser

fields.description: The session of the user from the browser

fields.name: visitor
fields.description: A session visitor is a unique identifier for our best guess as to who the individual user is interacting with Flow.

fields.name: visit
fields.description: A session visit expires after a configurable period of inactivity (e.g. 30 minutes).

fields.description: Geographic information for user

fields.name: created_at
fields.description: Date the event was processed. Not required because model is shared with browser and the time from the browser cannot be trusted. Server should set timestamp before further processing

fields.description: Represents a session created for an organization.

fields.name: visitor
fields.description: A session visitor is a unique identifier for our best guess as to who the individual user is interacting with Flow.

fields.name: number
fields.description: The order number or id

fields.name: revenue
fields.description: The total order cost

fields.name: geo
fields.description: Geographic information for user

fields.name: shipping
fields.description: The shipping amount applied to order

fields.name: duty
fields.description: The duty applied to the order

fields.name: tax
fields.description: The tax (VAT/HST/etc) applied to the order

fields.name: created_at
fields.description: Date the event was processed. Not required because model is shared with browser and the time from the browser cannot be trusted. Server should set timestamp before further processing

fields.name: number
fields.description: The Flow item number

fields.name: price
fields.description: The price in the base currency of the organization

fields.name: name
fields.description: The name of the product or variant (not description)

fields.name: categories
fields.description: List of categories the item belongs to

fields.name: id
fields.description: The id of the current visit

fields.name: created_at
fields.description: Date the event was processed. Not required because model is shared with browser and the time from the browser cannot be trusted. Server should set timestamp before further processing
